Description.Text: This 3 star hotel is located in the city centre of Ayia Napa and was established in 1990. It is close to the Thalassa Museum and the nearest station is no metro. The Hotel has a coffee shop, an indoor swimming pool, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre/gym. All 152 rooms are equipped with hairdryer, safe, ironing set and air conditioning.
